verse: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life. – John 3:16

verse: The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want. – Psalm 23:1
label: comfort

verse: Let everything that has breath praise the Lord. – Psalm 150:6

verse: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding. – Proverbs 3:5

label: priority

verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations. – Matthew 28:19

verse: Be still and know that I am God. – Psalm 46:10

verse: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me. – Philippians 4:13
